_comment: Copilot-specific metadata for each .claude/commands/*.md file. The generator reads this file and prepends a YAML frontmatter block to every command file to produce .github/prompts/*.prompt.md. Edit command BODIES in .claude/commands/. Edit METADATA (name/description/hint) here. Run generate-copilot-prompts.py after any change.

approve.name: Approve items
approve.description: Approve one or more implementation-plan items and assign branches.

archive.name: Archive items
archive.description: Archive eligible DONE and DENIED items from the implementation plan.

blockers.name: Manage blockers
blockers.description: Manage BLOCKER items — list, create, or resolve blockers.

board.name: Show board
board.description: Show a kanban-style board of all active items grouped by status column.
board.argument-hint: Optional filter: type, priority, or keyword.

bug.name: Create bug item
bug.description: Create a bug item in the implementation plan with optional modifiers.

check-deps.name: Check dependencies
check-deps.description: Show the dependency tree for an item — what it depends on, what depends on it, and any blockers.

debt.name: Create tech-debt item
debt.description: Create a tech-debt item in the implementation plan with optional modifiers.

deny.name: Deny item
deny.description: Deny an item in the implementation plan and archive it immediately.
deny.argument-hint: Item ID followed by optional reason.

fail.name: Fail item
fail.description: TST rejects an item in REVIEW — creates a linked BUG and returns to IN_PROGRESS.

feature.name: Create feature item
feature.description: Create a feature item in the implementation plan with optional modifiers.

implement.name: Implement items
implement.description: Implement one or more items from the plan, verify, and update results.
implement.argument-hint: Optional item IDs, comma or space-separated. Leave empty for all approved.

init_overview.name: Init overview
init_overview.description: Run initial code analysis and generate overview XML files.

lessons.name: Lessons learned
lessons.description: Show lessons learned from past implementation items, optionally filtered by category.

list.name: List items
list.description: List implementation-plan items with optional filters.
list.argument-hint: Optional filters: status, type, priority, or security.

overview.name: Architecture overview
overview.description: Show the architecture summary from the project overview.

pass.name: Pass item
pass.description: TST signs off on an item in REVIEW — transitions to DONE.

plan-impl.name: Plan implementation
plan-impl.description: Attach an implementation plan to an APPROVED item (DA role). Transitions to PLANNED.

plan_summary.name: Plan summary
plan_summary.description: Show a summary of the current implementation plan.

refactor.name: Create refactoring item
refactor.description: Create a refactoring item in the implementation plan with optional modifiers.

release.name: Manage release
release.description: Manage RELEASE items — create a release, update gates, or show release status.

security.name: Security audit
security.description: Run a security audit or show security status for the codebase.

sprint.name: Sprint management
sprint.description: Manage sprints — create, view, or close lightweight sprint groupings of 2-5 APPROVED items.

start.name: Start item
start.description: Start an item — transition from PLANNED (or APPROVED) to IN_PROGRESS.

status.name: Item status
status.description: Show the current status and details of a specific item.

submit.name: Submit item for review
submit.description: Submit an item for review — transition from IN_PROGRESS to REVIEW.

translate.name: Translate requirement
translate.description: Decompose a REQUIREMENT item into an EPIC with child FEATURE and ENABLER items.

update.name: Update overview
update.description: Run code analysis in update mode to refresh XML overviews.
